title: [CLIENT] Apparently I have negative IP...?
body:
After buying Dr. Mundo with IP, my balance dropped to -1157, even though I had enough IP to purchase him. When I try to purchase a champion by pressing the button in the bottom right of the "Purchase Item" screen, the balance drops even lower.
IP Balance: http://prntscr.com/847782
Buying: http://prntscr.com/8477e7

replies.body:
Hey NotStellate,

Have you tried logging out and logging back into the client? Sometimes, purchases will cause a visual glitch, making it appear as though you have less IP/RP than you should, or even negative amounts.
